faq.question: Do I need Obsidian to use the Soulbook?
faq.answer: The vault works best with Obsidian (free app), but the frameworks and prompts work in any note-taking system or even pen and paper.

faq.question: Which Life Book should I start with?
faq.answer: If you're a musician or artist, start with Life Symphony. If you're a seeker or visionary, try Golden Path. If you prefer structured systems, The 7 Pillars is for you.

faq.question: Is there a premium version?
faq.answer: The complete framework is free forever. Premium options include guided programs, community support, and 1:1 coaching - coming soon.

faq.question: How much time should we expect to invest?
faq.answer: Plan for a 90-day rollout with weekly story sprints. Teams typically spend 4–6 hours per week implementing and reviewing.

name: Aurora UI Kit
headline: 30 Premium Components with AI Generation Built In
subheadline: Production-ready Next.js components with glassmorphism, animations, and a Claude Code skill that generates new components in the same design language on demand.
promise: Stop building UI from scratch. Get 30 polished components plus an AI system that creates new ones matching your design system.
summary: A premium component library combining hand-crafted Next.js + Tailwind components with an agentic AI layer that generates custom variants on demand.
transformation: Drop 30 production-ready components into any Next.js project — PremiumCard, AuroraGradient, ShimmerButton, and more
Use the included Claude Code skill to generate new components that match the Aurora design language
Ship polished UIs in hours instead of weeks with pre-built dark/light mode, responsive layouts, and micro-interactions
Customize everything with documented design tokens — colors, spacing, animations, glass levels

guarantee.label: Ship It Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you can't ship a polished UI within 48 hours of purchase, get a full refund.

modules.title: Premium Component Library
modules.description: 30+ components: PremiumCard (5 gradient presets, 4 glass levels, tilt, glow), AuroraGradient (6 variants), ShimmerButton, MagneticHover, FloatingElement, CursorSpotlight, and more.

modules.title: Animation Systems
modules.description: MorphingBackground, SplitTextReveal, Marquee, ParallaxContainer, StaggerContainer — all with prefers-reduced-motion support.

modules.title: AI Generation Skill
modules.description: Claude Code skill that understands the Aurora design language. Tell it 'create a pricing card with aurora style' and it generates matching code.

modules.title: Design Token System
modules.description: Configurable color palettes, spacing scales, glass levels, and animation timings. Change one token, update the entire kit.

bonuses.title: 6 Page Templates
bonuses.description: Landing page, dashboard, pricing, blog, portfolio, and 404 — all built with Aurora components.

bonuses.title: Figma Design Tokens
bonuses.description: Matching Figma variables for designer-developer handoff.

faq.question: What tech stack does this require?
faq.answer: Next.js 14+, React 18+, Tailwind CSS 3+, and TypeScript. Components use zero external animation libraries — pure CSS + React.

faq.question: What makes this different from shadcn/ui?
faq.answer: Aurora UI Kit is a design-forward layer that sits on top of shadcn. While shadcn gives you unstyled primitives, Aurora gives you the visual polish — glassmorphism, gradients, micro-interactions, and the AI skill to generate more.

faq.question: How does the AI generation skill work?
faq.answer: It's a Claude Code skill file (.claude/skills/) that you drop into your project. When activated, you can describe components in natural language and it generates code matching Aurora's design patterns.

faq.question: Can I use this in commercial projects?
faq.answer: Yes. MIT license. Use in unlimited personal and commercial projects.

headline: Your AI-Powered Content Production System
subheadline: A complete Next.js content platform with built-in AI writing assistance, SEO optimization, social distribution automation, and analytics. Not a template — a system.
promise: Go from idea to published, SEO-optimized, socially distributed content in under 30 minutes. Every single time.
summary: Production-ready content management system combining a premium blog platform with agentic AI capabilities for writing, SEO, and distribution.
transformation: Publish SEO-optimized articles with AI-assisted writing that maintains your voice and style
Auto-generate social media posts for every article across Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and newsletter formats
Track content performance with built-in analytics dashboard — pageviews, time on page, conversion events
Use Claude Code skills to run your entire content pipeline from the terminal: research, write, optimize, publish

guarantee.label: Content Velocity Guarantee
guarantee.description: Publish your first AI-assisted article within 24 hours of setup or get a full refund.

modules.title: Premium Blog Platform
modules.description: MDX-powered blog with syntax highlighting, table of contents, reading time, related posts, and responsive images. Dark/light mode. Schema markup built in.

modules.title: AI Writing Pipeline
modules.description: Claude Code skills for research, outlining, drafting, and editing. Prompt library with 20+ content templates. Voice calibration system to match your style.

modules.title: SEO Engine
modules.description: Automatic meta tag generation, FAQ schema injection, internal linking suggestions, and keyword density analysis. Every article optimized before publish.

modules.title: Social Distribution
modules.description: One-click generation of Twitter threads, LinkedIn posts, newsletter editions, and RSS feeds from any article. Scheduled publishing support.

modules.title: Analytics Dashboard
modules.description: Built-in analytics with pageviews, popular posts, reading patterns, and conversion tracking. No third-party scripts required.

bonuses.title: Content Calendar Template
bonuses.description: Notion + Airtable template for planning, tracking, and managing your content pipeline.

bonuses.title: SEO Keyword Research Kit
bonuses.description: Python scripts for keyword research, competitor analysis, and content gap identification.

bonuses.title: Email Newsletter Integration
bonuses.description: Resend-powered newsletter system with subscriber management and automated sends.

faq.question: Is this a WordPress alternative?
faq.answer: Yes, but faster. Built on Next.js with static generation, so pages load instantly. No database required — content lives in MDX files in your repo.

faq.question: Do I need Claude Code to use this?
faq.answer: The blog platform works standalone. The AI writing pipeline and automation features require Claude Code (free tier works). The skills activate automatically when Claude Code is installed.

faq.question: How does the AI maintain my voice?
faq.answer: The system includes a voice calibration prompt that learns from your existing content. Feed it 3-5 of your best articles and it adapts to your style, tone, and vocabulary.

faq.question: Can I deploy this on Vercel for free?
faq.answer: Yes. The hobby tier on Vercel handles most content sites. The system is optimized for static generation so hosting costs stay minimal.
